Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-50387 affecting package dnsmasq for versions less than 2.90-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-50387 affecting package dnsmasq for versions less than 2.90-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package dnsmasq is earlier than 2.90-1, affected by CVE-2023-50387
